mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_USER (INQUIRY_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, NICKNAME, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_WRITEDATE, INQUIRY_TYPE) VALUES (INQ_PERSONAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_serial}, #{nickname}, #{inquiry_title}, #{inquiry_content}, SYSDATE, #{inquiry_type})
mapper.select: SELECT U.MEMBER_SERIAL, U.NICKNAME, U.INQUIRY_TITLE, U.INQUIRY_CONTENT, U.INQUIRY_WRITEDATE, U.INQUIRY_TYPE, U.INQUIRY_SERIAL AS U_SERIAL , A.INQUIRY_SERIAL AS A_SERIAL, A.INQUIRY_RE_SERIAL, A.INQUIRY_RE_CONTENT, A.INQUIRY_RE_DATE, A.ADMIN_NAME FROM INQUIRY_USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN INQUIRY_ADMIN A ON U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = A.INQUIRY_SERIAL WHERE U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = #{inquiry_serial}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRY_ADMIN WHERE INQUIRY_SERIAL = #{inquiry_serial }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_ADMIN (INQUIRY_RE_SERIAL, INQUIRY_SERIAL, INQUIRY_RE_CONTENT, INQUIRY_RE_DATE, ADMIN_NAME) VALUES (INQ_RE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{inquiry_serial}, #{inquiry_re_content}, SYSDATE, #{admin_name})
mapper.delete: DELETE U, A FROM INQUIRY_USER AS U INNER JOIN INQUIRY_ADMIN AS A ON U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = A.INQUIRY_SERIAL WHERE U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = #{inquiry_serial }
